about_the_game:
Extra Features:

  • Ability to turn off the timer for a more relaxed and endless experience
  • Ability to turn off the translations rule for an easier practice experience
  • Supporter Badge on game screens
  • Early access to future updates



Support the development of Count to Ten and our other games and gain some extra features as a thank you, with early access to any future updates we create for Count to Ten.
detailed_description:
Extra Features:

  • Ability to turn off the timer for a more relaxed and endless experience
  • Ability to turn off the translations rule for an easier practice experience
  • Supporter Badge on game screens
  • Early access to future updates



Support the development of Count to Ten and our other games and gain some extra features as a thank you, with early access to any future updates we create for Count to Ten.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Count to Ten - Supporter Edition

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Count to Ten - Supporter Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 as per Steam Client Requirements
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gain a special badge, some extra options, and early access to future updates by supporting Count to Ten with the Supporter Edition. Practice your skills or have a more relaxing experience by turning off the timer or removing the most difficult elements.
